feed.title: 蹲得越低, 跳得越高

entry.title: The first blog post at here
entry.content: Finally I start my blog. This idea always jump out in my mind. In the end, I am here. Hopefully the github pages would help a lot for me. Maybe I would want to try nodejs in the following months. However, I still have plenty things on my lists. Just want a blog to share what I have learned and experienced.
